page.title: 13Panfield Survey
page.content: A 15% response to the{Shalford {W.I.}survey gave us the following view of residents of{Panfield Village. Of the replies received 85% of homes are owner occupied. 60 households account for 180 people. 9 of these are pensioners and 51 under 16yrs. Two thirds of these homes keep pets. 91 people are in paid employment. 17 of these work more than 15 miles from home. 10 households have no car but some of these have motorcycles or bicycles. From about half the homes nobody uses the local bus but a few make occasional train journeys. All but 3 households use the{village shop {but most visit B'tree}regularly and go to larger towns for special items. Hobbies mentioned are very varied and include many sports, gardening, reading, beekeeping, wine making, crafts, DIY and computing.
